intro: Torularia subtilissima, commonly known as the delicate torula, is a small, herbaceous plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Poaceae, commonly known as the grass family. The plant is characterized by its slender, tufted growth habit and narrow, linear leaves. It produces small, pale green to yellowish flowers that are clustered in dense, spike-like inflorescences. Torularia subtilissima is typically found in sandy or rocky soils and is adapted to arid or semi-arid environments.
